statements: UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET safety_stock = 30, reorder_point = 10 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = 50, safety_stock = 20 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE inventory SET product_name = 'New Product Name', reorder_point = 30 WHERE product_id = 102
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET quantity = 50, price = 25.99 WHERE product_name = 'Widget' AND supplier_id = 'a1213cfe-6b2f-4cc0-9b31-7590346e3a2a';
UPDATE supply_chain_management SET supplier_contact = '123-456-7890', supplier_email = 'supplier@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 'c21556fc-26b4-48fa-bc1e-f211cc79e90c';
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = 25.65 WHERE product_name = 'Widget Alpha' AND supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE supply_chain_management SET contact_person = 'John Doe', supplier_address = '123 Main Street, City, Country', supplier_contact = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_name = 'Acme Supplies';
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, last_updated = '2022-01-20 15:30:00' WHERE product_id = 102 AND warehouse_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, stock_quantity = 1000 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET last_updated = '2022-08-15 08:30:00', quantity = 500 WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND product_id = 5;
UPDATE Inventory SET item_category = 'Electronics' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 3;
UPDATE Inventory SET item_category = 'Electronics' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'customer@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 20 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouses SET capacity = 1000, location = 'New Location' WHERE warehouse_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity=20, unit_price=15.99 WHERE item_id=1;
UPDATE orders SET quantity=10, order_date='2022-07-15' WHERE order_id=5;
